typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		inss_postcode as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_activeregister as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		inss_country as string,
		inss_addresstype as string,
		inss_addressline2 as string,
		inss_addressline3 as string,
		ownerid as string,
		inss_addressline1 as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		inss_addressline4 as string,
		inss_addressline5 as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		inss_name as string,
		inss_inssaddressid as string,
		createdon as string,
		createdby as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(strInssPostcode = toString(inss_postcode),
		strInssInssAddressId = toString(inss_inssaddressid),
		tsModifiedOn = toTimestamp(modifiedon),
		tsCreatedOn = toTimestamp(createdon),
		tsINSSDateFrom = toTimestamp(byName('inss_datefrom')),
		tsINSSDateTo = toTimestamp(byName('inss_dateto'))) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(strInssPostcode) || isNull(strInssInssAddressId) || isNull(tsModifiedOn) || isNull(tsCreatedOn ) || isNull(tsINSSDateFrom), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(strInssPostcode = coalesce(strInssPostcode,'missing'),
		strInssInssAddressId = coalesce(strInssInssAddressId, 'missing'),
		tsModifiedOn = coalesce(tsModifiedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsCreatedOn = coalesce(tsCreatedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsINSSDateFrom = coalesce(tsINSSDateFrom, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsINSSDateTo = coalesce(tsINSSDateTo, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'))) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strInssPostcode) > 8 || length(strInssInssAddressId) > 36, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strInssPostcode = left(strInssPostcode, 8),
		strInssInssAddressId = left(strInssInssAddressId, 36)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
